data.author: calamari Software

changelog.release_notes: Initial release

data.description:
Klondike Solitaire for Pebble.

Includes Vegas scoring, one and three card draw modes, and selectable flip limit. Controls allow you to automatically skip over ineligible piles and move cards to the foundations, for more fun and less button presses! 

Please visit the webpage to report bugs and download the source code.

Enjoy!

latest_release.release_notes: Initial release

data.title: Solitaire

data.author: Susan

ios.name: Emoji Enable Support for Pebble Smartwatch

data.description:
Enable Pebble and Pebble Steel Smartwatch emoji support.

When the notification contains Emoji sent to Pebble, the pebble Smartwatch shows the useless Empty 'Square' instead of the Emoji we want. With this app, the emoji could be shown correctly in Pebble and pebble steel smart watch.

You need install the pebble official app before using this app.
data.title: Emoji Enable Support

data.author: Ko

changelog.release_notes: Added data persistence

v1.3 Release Notes
* Added watch app icon
* Overhauled watch face, instant recall, timer config, timer preset assistant UI
* Optimized source code for memory resource usage
* Preset allow for 0.1 precision on segments
Added "Preset Assistant" for Pacerband. Enter end goal time, and number of timer segments: the assistant will fill in the segments with average segment lap times.

Adds "delta(stopwatch split, timer split)" and "stopwatch split" on the temporary warning window when recording a lap.
Enables countdown timer automatically when the user specifies a non-zero timer segment.

data.description:
RaceTime is a general-purpose, standalone workout stopwatch app for the most time obsessed athletes. Features include:
* data persistence
* 50-lap memory
* main display color inversion
* Review recorded lap times during the workout
* Save and review saved workouts
* Integrated Pacerband technology: 50-segment countdown timers in single/repeat modes

latest_release.release_notes: Added data persistence

data.title: RaceTime

data.author: Omar G

changelog.release_notes: This is the first release of the app.

data.description:
Here is a chess clock on your wrist.
App is already in settings when you open it. Using the up and down buttons adjust the time. The select button cycles through the hours, minutes, and seconds.
Press and hold the select button to start the count down. White will countdown first. Pressing either the up or down switches timers. Select button brings the app to settings.

latest_release.release_notes: This is the first release of the app.

data.title: Chess Clock

data.description:
Control Microsoft PowerPoint on Mac OS X from your Pebble!

Use the buttons to go to next/previous slides, or press and hold for last/first.

Requires:
- Mac OS X
- Microsoft PowerPoint

Download and run PebblePointServer.app.  https://db.tt/nvHQZmPg

Or, if you're more technical you can install the Node.js package, pebblepoint_server, which is much slimmer.

data.description:
With the BIKE SHARING app you'll always have the closest bike sharing station on your wrist with the number of free bikes and free slots. 
It works worldwide!! Pisa, Paris, New York, Wien, Chicago, London, Barcelona, Milano, Montreal, Miami and many other cities.

Use the select button to update the data and the down button to view other nearby stations.

NEW: Long press on select button enable/disable refresh with shaking!

-> Follow me on twitter @ferra_andre and use #bikesharing4pebble


BIKE SHARING is powered by http://api.citybik.es/v2/

latest_release.release_notes:
New App Glance.
Pebble 2 (Diorite) support.
Bugfix.

data.title: Bike Sharing

data.author: Matthew Hungerford
data.description:
OpenGL for Pebble.  
Provides minimal OpenGL 1.1 engine for rendering 3D graphics.  
Renders STL models in both wireframe and filled with positional lighting sources.
Top button changes angle, middle changes wireframe mode, bottom changes models (9 models total).
Free memory allows for up to 300 polygon models to be rendered.
data.title: PebbleGL 3D

data.author: Adam Harvey

changelog.release_notes:
* Update to the 2.3 SDK (should run on watches running 2.1+).
* Add long pressing of the wicket button to reset all of the counters.
* Add persistence of the over, ball and wicket counts between app runs.

data.description: A basic ball, over and wicket counter for cricket umpires.

latest_release.release_notes:
* Update to the 2.3 SDK (should run on watches running 2.1+).
* Add long pressing of the wicket button to reset all of the counters.
* Add persistence of the over, ball and wicket counts between app runs.

data.author: Ian Wagner

changelog.release_notes: Minor branding update.
Displays total remaining distance on the destination info screen (down button) with companion app version >= 1.6

UI Improvements
* Larger font
* It is no longer necessary to hold the up or down button; the next step or final destination will be displayed automatically for 5 seconds, or until you press another button
Minor bug fixes.
Turns out the last battery-saving update was a little overzealous ;) This bug fix makes the app more usable at night.

This update brings smart activation of your watch's backlight. When you are close to a turn (< 250 m), your watch backlight will activate and stay on if the sun has set (based on your current location). For you Scandinavians and others living near the polar regions, the calculation even factors in the midnight sun and polar night conditions ;)
Holding the down button lets you see the destination address at any time (requires the latest version of the companion app).

data.description:
Smartwatch GPS for Pebble brings the power of Apple’s directions API straight to your Pebble.

- Simple, turn-by-turn directions
- Vibrations to let you know when a turn is coming up (the companion app will even relaunch your watchapp when you approach a turn!)
- Automatic recalculation when you go off the route
- Check the next turn by holding UP
- See the destination address by holding DOWN

latest_release.release_notes: Minor branding update.

data.title: Smartwatch GPS for Pebble

data.author: Dr. Antonio Aguilera.

changelog.release_notes:
Version 2.35.01 makes sure that the "inverted" watch-face (Reloj Núm. 10) will always display the seconds hand clearly running backwards, and display at least the numbers 3 and 9 (in their inverted position, of course) regardless of their corresponding settings. 

This is because last night I woke up and misread the time because my watch happened to be displaying this "inverted" watch-face with no second hand, no numbers, and so I had no clue of that!)

data.description:
Esta app maneja 35 relojes diferentes y sus opciones mediante un sistema de menú. (Sí, treinta y cinco).

This app handles 35 different watch-faces and their options by means of a custom menu system. (Yes, thirty five).

If you really like it, give a "heart" to this app and, when it gets "muchos" (plenty of) hearts, I will develop an English version of it.

latest_release.release_notes:
Version 2.35.01 makes sure that the "inverted" watch-face (Reloj Núm. 10) will always display the seconds hand clearly running backwards, and display at least the numbers 3 and 9 (in their inverted position, of course) regardless of their corresponding settings. 

This is because last night I woke up and misread the time because my watch happened to be displaying this "inverted" watch-face with no second hand, no numbers, and so I had no clue of that!)

data.title: Muchos(Menu)

initial release

data.description: Outdoor archery target scoring app. Select score with the up and down buttons, enter score with the select button and delete the last score by holding down the select button. Hold the up key for view of all past scores. You can delete scores back to the start of your scoring. After every 36 arrows it will notify you of your round total for the last 36 arrows. After 144 arrows it will give you your end total and each round total.

data.author: Patrick Balestra

changelog.release_notes:
- Updated for iOS 8
- Now fully compatible with iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus
- Now you can call from your Pebble! Select a contact on your Pebble and press the select button when the pone number is selected. ONLY if the Contacts for Pebble app is opened in foreground (not in background), a call will start.
- Various improvements

data.description:
Select contacts from your library and send them to your Pebble. They are saved on your watch so you can always have your contacts (name, phone number and email) on your wrist. 
It’s super easy: just install the companion watchapp, select some contacts and boom, they are already on your Pebble. 

Always keep the Contacts app opened on your Pebble while sending/deleting contacts on the iPhone.

latest_release.release_notes:
- Updated for iOS 8
- Now fully compatible with iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus
- Now you can call from your Pebble! Select a contact on your Pebble and press the select button when the pone number is selected. ONLY if the Contacts for Pebble app is opened in foreground (not in background), a call will start.
- Various improvements

What's new in this version:

1. Walk+ now works over Bluetooth LE - you can now launch the app, and toggle recordings all without ever opening the companion iPhone app.
2. A fresh, revised interface for Pebble Time Round
3. Updates for the Pebble Classic and Pebble Steel Classic for Pebble 3.8.

What's new in this version:

1. Additional memory and performance improvements.

What's new in this version:

1. Memory usage improvements.

What's new in this release: 

1. Updated for Pebble Time with color maps! 
2. Improved app efficiency with 15% better battery life Pebble Time!

What's new in this release:

1. Added support for 24h time.

What's new in this version:

1. Improved reliability of connection to iPhone.
2. Added support for steps for iPhone 5S, iPhone 6, and iPhone 6+.

What's new in this version: 

1. Walk+ users can now get trail hazard alerts in the app as they walk! 
2. Completely updated for version 2.5 firmware with many bug fixes and significant improvement in memory usage for better app performance.

What's new in this version: 
1. Added data screen with Pebble battery and iPhone battery levels. 
2. Added data screen with temperature, wind speed, and wind direction. 
3. Performance enhancements.
Pebble 2.1.1 Initial Release

data.description:
Walk+ is the only walking app developed by World Champion Athletes!

Walk+ integrates seamlessly with the Walk + iOS App to display walk time, pace, distance, altitude, grade, total climbing , and more. Users can start and stop walk recordings, toggle segment timers, and view maps all from the convenience of your wrist.

data.description:
How calm are you ?
So KEEP CALM AND HOLD THE BALL!

SteadyBall is a simple (lovely and annoying) game where you should use your skills to hold the ball on the hole.
Keep steady as long as you can, and try to beat the high score.

Try it out!

Coming soon:
- Game modes
- Game levels
- and much more :)

data.author: ebolakid

changelog.release_notes:
- Changed the update frequency from one (1) to two (2) minutes.
- Added "Data updated" information to the menu.
- Small cosmetic changes to the menu on Pebble and Pebble Time.
- Code consolidation in preparation for upcoming hardware models.
- Bug fix: Fixed an intermittent bug with the in-app match reminder functionality.

- Brought back the selected menu option indicator.
- From now on, EuroFootball is only compatible with Pebbles running 3.X firmware.
- Bug fix: Match reminders will now work as expected on Pebble and Pebble Time.
- Bug fix: Improvements on Pebble and Pebble Steel 3.X compatibility.

- Changed the selected menu option indicator.
- Bug fix: It is no longer possible to accidentally subscribe to Timeline pins for two league at the same time.

- Added support for Pebble Time Round.
- Battery optimization.
- Bug fix: EuroFootball will now work better when Pebble and Pebble Steel gets 3.X firmware (At least in theory).
- Bug fix: EuroFootball will no longer display two notification when changing pins within a league.

- Added Scottish Premiership.
- Added Swiss Super League.
- Added outcome of last game (Win/Draw/Lose) to the table for each team.
- You can now choose what type of Timeline pins you want to recieve (News, Table, and/or Match pins).
- Changed the main font in order to provide full character support on Pebble Time.
- Changed the country of Premier League and Championship from EN to UK.
- Smaller changes to the menu functionality.
- Bug fix: The bluetooth disconnect text color should now revert back to white when reconnected.

- Added English Championship.
- Added Dutch Jupiler League.
- Memory optimization Part III.
- Bug fix: Opening EuroFootball from a Austrian Bundesliga pin now works as expected.
- Bug fix: Fixed a bug with vibrate on goal when a league changing match reminder was triggered.

- Added Belgium Jupiler Pro League.
- Added Portuguese Primeira Liga.
- Added Danish Superliga.
- Added Austrian Bundesliga.
- Memory optimization Part II.
- Pressing select while in full screen now launches the menu.
- Added pagination (X/X) of the league to the menu.
- Added the status bar to the full screen table.
- Bug fix: Changed the name of the Turkish league.

- Added German 2. Bundesliga.
- Holding the Select button will now exit the full screen mode.
- Code stabilization of the data download parts.
- Memory optimization Part I.
- Bug fix: Fixed a Timeline subscription/un-subscription bug (Pebble Time only).
- Bug fix: Better alignment of the battery percent and page number when in full screen (Pebble Time only).

- Added a splash of color for Pebble Time!
- Added Timeline support (Currently only available with Pebble Time).
- Added a settings page to choose which league to get Timeline pins from (Currently only available with Pebble Time).
- Changed the loading text when launched on Pebble Time.
- Minor code refactoring.
- Bug fix: Fixed the bluetooth connection text when backing out from the full screen mode.

- Changed the behavior of the menu when you change between News, Table, and Matches.
- Small semantic changes to the menu so it would better reflect the changes of upcoming matches in V1.7.
- Bug fix: The match reminder function should now work as intended on Pebble Time.

- Changed the order in the menu to News, Table, Matches instead of Table, News, Matches.
- Added information about the app version to the menu.
- Bug fix: Additional bug fixes to improve Pebble Time compatibility.

- Added upcoming matches to be shown on days without matches.
- Bug fix: EuroFootball now works with Pebble Time.

- Changed the default menu option to News instead of Table.
- Removed the battery menu option and added battery level to the main screen.

- Added Dutch Eredivisie.
- Added match reminder functionality.

Note: The Eredivisie news feed comes from NOS.nl.

- Added Turkish Super League.
- Bug fix: EuroFootball will no longer compare scores when changing leagues.
- Bug fix: Removed the leading zero when time display is set to 12h.

Note: Since the Pebble cannot handle turkish characters, the Super League uses UEFA:s general news feed.

- The current menu option is now pre-selected when launching the menu.
- Changed the update vibration from single vibration to double vibration.
- Added vibrate on goal in league (Across all matches).
- Added vibrate on goal in current match.

- Added support for Super League [GR].
- Added support for Champions League [INT].
- Bug fix: Fixed a bug where the screen could go blank even if the data was fully loaded.

Note: Since the Pebble cannot handle greek characters, the Super League uses UEFA:s general news feed.

- New menu icon.
- The league table can now be viewed in full screen.
- New update frequency: Never (great if you want to keep the app on over night).
- Minor cosmetic fixes to the menu.
- Bug fix: You can no longer browse the information in the app when BT is lost.
- Bug fix: The battery menu option now works better then before.

data.description:
Stay up-to-date with 20 European football / soccer leagues from 15 different countries, now with Timeline integration!

Get live scores, breaking news, and table data right to your wrist at as low as two minute intervals.

Never miss a kick with EuroFootball, the most comprehensive football / soccer app for Pebble!

Featuring:
- Premier League [EN]
- Bundesliga [DE]
- La Liga (Liga BBVA) [ES]
- Serie A [IT]
- Ligue 1 [FR]
- Allsvenskan [SE]
- Superettan [SE]
- Super League [GR]
- Champions League [INT]
- Süper Lig [TR]
- Eredivisie [NL]
- 2. Bundesliga [DE]

- Small cosmetic changes to the menu on Pebble and Pebble Time.
- Code consolidation in preparation for upcoming hardware models.
- Bug fix: Fixed an intermittent bug with the in-app match reminder functionality.

data.description:
Traverse Middle-Earth fighting your way through random encounters with all of your favorite creatures from Tolkiens universe! Stay alive, use your magic sparingly, and prepare yourself for your battle with the Dark Lord...

data.title: MiniLOTR

data.author: WearGa

changelog.release_notes:
• Updated for the latest Pebble firmware and SDK (v3.2)
• The game now saves progress just before equipping any new equipment or upgrades. So if you do encounter any issues purchasing or equipping the Mothership, the next time you load the app your progress should be restored and the correct item purchased and equipped.

Bug fix:
• A problem with the Mothership has now been resolved, and you can now purchase it successfully
Pixel Miner v2.0 redesigned and updated with full color support for Pebble Time and Pebble Time Steel
Updated for the new Pebble SDK 2.6.1

Contains a bug fix to stop the app crashing when trying to equip some of the later equipment items (e.g. Excavator or Dragon) if the device was running low on memory. The miner now only mines in one direction (from left to right), in order to reduce the memory usage of the app.
Keep mining!

Bug fixes:
• Fixed the pixels value decreasing if the value is already close to the maximum number, and you are trying to sell multiple items of treasure at once

• Selling Treasure: You can now sell all items of a particular type by pressing and holding the sell button 
• Equipment List: When entering the Equipment menu, it will highlight the next available item to purchase by default 
• Multipliers List: When entering the Multiplier menu, it will highlight the next available item to purchase by default 

*** EXISTING PIXEL MINER PLAYERS PLEASE NOTE *** 
If you upgrade from a previous version of Pixel Miner, you will be required to unload the application and then load this new version. At present this unfortunately causes the game save data to be removed, so if you don't want to start your game from the beginning please don't upgrade yet. We are working with Pebble to find a solution that allows the save data to be maintained with an application upgrade, and will update you as soon as we can! Keep mining!
First public release

data.description:
Become the greatest miner in the Pixelverse. How deep can you go?

Pixel Miner has been redesigned and upgraded with full color support on Pebble Time and Pebble Time Steel.

"One of the greatest and most pointless games I have ever had the pleasure or wasting my life on" – Ty Gadberry

latest_release.release_notes:
• Updated for the latest Pebble firmware and SDK (v3.2)
• The game now saves progress just before equipping any new equipment or upgrades. So if you do encounter any issues purchasing or equipping the Mothership, the next time you load the app your progress should be restored and the correct item purchased and equipped.

data.title: Pixel Miner

data.author: Mountain Edge Inc.
data.description:
Android Widget with Pebble smartwatch support for Jawbone® UP and UP24

Now you can have a Pebble watchface or watchapp with UP/UP24 data shown using this widget.  Your Pebble acts like a mini dashboard for your UP/UP24!

The widgets are plugin for Pebble Canvas.  Please install Pebble Canvas. Using the Pebble Canvas, you can create new dynamic watchface or watchapp with your UP/UP24 data.
data.title: UPIt Pebble Pro for UP/UP24®

data.author: Mountain Edge Inc.

Android Widget with Pebble smartwatch support for Fitbit®

Now you can have a Pebble watchface or watchapp with Fitbit data shown using this widget.  Your Pebble acts like a mini dashboard for your Fitbit wristband!

The widgets are plugin for Pebble Canvas.  Please install Pebble Canvas.   you can create new dynamic watchface or watch app with your data & images.

data.author: bahbka

changelog.release_notes: Reduced GPS cache lifetime
Workaround for APP_MSG_INTERNAL_ERROR

Extract fields from any level of JSON (useful with KimonoLabs API); multiple content fields will be concatenated with '\n\n'; other fields will be converted to integer, first copy will be used. Don't schedule update if another one already in progress. Keeps update type on retries when update failed.
Update with shake function (append shake=1 GET param while update, configurable); Changed scroll param behavior, now used to define scroll offset as percentage; Truncate content if too big
Added authentication.

Ability to change up/down buttons behavior from JSON (scrolling or up=1|2,down=1|2 params); Added HTTP request header Pebble-Token (unique to device/app pair), can be used for server-side device identification; WARNING: Changed short=1/long=1 params to select=1/select=2 (sorry for this)

Append coordinates to URL (configurable); digital clock font; AM/PM support; seconds dots blinking (configurable); configurable vibration on bluetooth loss; turn on light (value in JSON); blink content (value in JSON); scroll-up content after update (value in JSON); improved configuration page; some minor fixes.
Append short=1 or long=1 GET param to URL on short/long select button update.

data.description: Shows your data, JSON prepared on your own server. Simple and minimalistic. Vibrate, change theme, change font from your JSON. See documentation on github. WARNING: You need own server and some server-side programming, none built-in services present.

latest_release.release_notes: Reduced GPS cache lifetime

data.title: My Data

changelog.release_notes: v2.3: Fixed bug where multi-line routes would overflow into eta text, and added Shake to refresh support for menu and single preset views.
v2.2 - Fixed bug where ETA would not display on single preset window.
v2.1 Minor changes to some text
v2.0.0 is a big UI update, as I've basically rewritten the entire application. Full changelog is available at http://tjstein.me/urbuses/changelog.html

Updated to v1.1.0 -No longer displays "Preset #" when there are unset presets. Now just scrolls past them. -Shows warning page prompting user to go to Settings page when there are no available presets. 
-"Clear All Presets" button available on Settings page.
-Shows error page when it detects that persistent storage is broken.
Added an application menu icon.
Fixed an issue where upon opening the app, the first opened preset would not display the ETA for a minute.
Edited API calls, no real change to app.

Added the ability for users to remove presets.
Also fixed a small graphical issue with route text.
Fixed issue for iOS where presets saved in the wrong spots.
Initial release

data.description:
Welcome to the evohome Pebble Watchapp.   This is designed to complement the Honeywell Total Connect Comfort App and will control the evohome smart zoning thermostat and control system. European evohome & TCC accounts only.

-	View all home zones and temperatures – even hot water
-	Ability to select any evohome quick action so control your home via your Pebble watch!

latest_release.release_notes: API Update

data.title: evohome Watchapp

data.author: DanHca

changelog.release_notes: First PebbleForce release.

data.description:
Salesforce1 Pebble Dashboard
This is an application that can connect to any Salesforce Instance and securely display the totals from your reports on your Pebble using iOS. You simply need to set the ‘Report Unique Name’ of any of your Salesforce reports to ‘Pebble_Watch_Summary_0’ and provide a ‘Report Description’ {also use _1 and _2}.
The full documentation in GitHub.

latest_release.release_notes: First PebbleForce release.

data.title: PebbleForce Dashboard for Salesforce

data.description:
Control your Lockitron lock right from your Pebble! Built using Pebble.js and Cloudpebble.net. Thanks Huy and Katharine!
No locks? remember to log in: My Pebble -> Pebbletron -> Settings

Source:  http://goo.gl/2iZdeG

Known Bugs:
- on-boot the mainMenu may hold the wrong state of each lock
- mainMenu does not refresh after changing new favLocks
- there's an extra window for some reason
data.title: Pebbletron

data.author: Bob Blauschild

changelog.release_notes:
Loosened sensitivity to small movements while waiting for the random start pulse.  Previous sensitivity produced a "started 2 soon" result too easily.

Fix for crashes caused by pushing the bottom (start) button during the introduction and/or title screen.

Fix for crashes caused by pushing the bottom (start) button again once the game has started.

data.description:
How fast can you react?  

FlipFast starts with your palm up and held steady.  After a random number of seconds your Pebble vibrates and a timer starts.  Flip your palm down as quickly as you can to stop the timer.  Your result, including reaction time, is shown on the watchface. Can you do better next time? 
 
With 5 selectable reaction speed test levels, anyone can be challenged.

latest_release.release_notes:
Loosened sensitivity to small movements while waiting for the random start pulse.  Previous sensitivity produced a "started 2 soon" result too easily.

Fix for crashes caused by pushing the bottom (start) button during the introduction and/or title screen.

Fix for crashes caused by pushing the bottom (start) button again once the game has started.

data.title: FlipFast

changelog.release_notes: Fixes a problem where the bottom button (send) would not work if you had not configured at least one address in your address book. Now the send function works, even without anything in your address book.
V0.2 - Fixes a bug for some new users.
Initial release.

data.description:
DogeLove is a complete DogeCoin wallet on your watch. Use it to tip friends or pay for services! So nice! So much love!

This app is currently in beta test. Use at your own risk. Please contact @sarfata on twitter with feedbacks.

latest_release.release_notes: Fixes a problem where the bottom button (send) would not work if you had not configured at least one address in your address book. Now the send function works, even without anything in your address book.
